channel.title: build_update on The Miette
channel.description: Recent content in build_update on The Miette

item.title: September 2022 Build Update
item.description: A September build update Hello Spring! Working almost every weekend, these last two months we’ve actually got a proper build update ðŸ˜„. Table Of Contents What we’ve done Highlights Challenges What’s next? What we’ve done We went through our stash of 90x45mm lengths and picked out roof rafters. These have been measured down to a 20 degree angle and some have been cut to size! We’ve been doing this in the garage when there has been a rain shower break and it has worked quite well.

item.title: July 2022 Build Update
item.description: A July build update What have we done? Absolutely nothing. Lys honestly thinks it’s been the wettest July that we’ve lived through in sunny Australia. Table Of Contents What we’ve done Challenges What’s next? What we’ve done Erny jetted off to the US for a few weeks to play ultimate frisbee! Left to her own devices Lys did a few sundry things like source suppliers for our metal connectors. We’ve also added a few new features to the site - now you can add comments and now subscribe if you feel so inclined.

item.title: June 2022 Build Update
item.description: A June build update Decided that we should do monthly build updates as we march towards the end of the year. We’re hoping to reach lock up by then (walls, floor and roof complete) and 31st December is our D-day. Table Of Contents What we’ve done Challenges What’s next? What we’ve done Erny bought a second hand table saw for $400 a few months back and it’s been an absolute workhorse.
